database.name: VIEW EHCM_EARNING_DEDUCTIONS_V
database.view: SELECT employee_details.ehcm_earn_deduct_emp_id AS ehcm_earning_deductions_v_id, payroll.ad_client_id, payroll.ad_org_id, payroll.isactive, payroll.created, payroll.createdby, payroll.updated, payroll.updatedby, payroll.ehcm_payrolldef_period_id, payroll.ehcm_payroll_definition_id, payroll.ehcm_element_group_id, payroll.ehcm_earn_deduct_payroll_id, employee_details.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, employee_details.emp_type, employee_details.emp_name, employee_details.hire_date, employee_details.department_id, employee_details.section_id, employee_details.ehcm_grade_id, employee_details.ehcm_position_id, employee_details.job_title, employee_details.assigned_dept, employee_details.employmentgrade, employee_details.ehcm_payscaleline_id, employee_details.ehcm_gradeclass_id, employee_details.emp_status FROM ehcm_earn_deduct_payroll payroll JOIN ehcm_earn_deduct_emp employee_details ON payroll.ehcm_earn_deduct_payroll_id = employee_details.ehcm_earn_deduct_payroll_id
